directions: Stir lime juice, mint leaves, and sweetener together in a pitcher; gently crush and bruise mint leaves with a wooden spoon.
Pour diet lemon-lime soda into juice mixture and stir until sweetener has dissolved.
Mix in crushed ice to serve.
ingredients: 1/4 cup granular sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®)
title: Sugar-Free Mojito Punch
